before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"6gto5","text":"This protocol works with both fresh snapfrozen and AllProtect preserved tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"70r09","text":"This protocol demonstrates how to perform RNA isolation from fresh snapfrozen and AllProtect preserved human meniscus tissue.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

materials_text: {"blocks":[{"key":"69idn","text":"Liquid Nitrogen (LN) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f9m0q","text":"Ladle for Liquid Nitrogen ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3m97","text":"Wet ice in Ice Bucket ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cr8ic","text":"Dry Ice to keep samples frozen ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"98br","text":"RNAse Away reagent to clean tools and workspace ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4hg8p","text":"Clean Mortar and Pestle ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f95jn","text":"Silicone Cover for Mortar and Pestle ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"b550u","text":"Small plastic scoop (chemical scoop) ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6c8g4","text":"Clean forceps to take out sample from tube ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4rf2n","text":"Scalpel for tissue cutting ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5lh8e","text":"Kimwipes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"27fa2","text":"Trizol or TRI Reagent ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"95pcf","text":"CK28R Precellys Ceramic Bead Tubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e5vs6","text":"Precellys or Bead Tissue Disruptor  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3sens","text":"1.5 mL microtubes ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dmbo0","text":"Benchtop vortex ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"c2bns","text":"Microtube rotator in 4C walk in fridge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gbol","text":"Precooled 4C benchtop centrifuge ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"asdqb","text":"100% Ethanol for protocol and to make complete prewash and wash buffers IF NEEDED ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"ecf7l","text":"Chloroform ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"56jv6","text":"Zymo Direct-zol RNA MicroPrep Kit - columns, collection tubes, prewash buffer, wash buffer, DNase I, DNA Digestion Buffer, DNase free water ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":33}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working for bulk RNA isolation and RNA-seq.

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cb0er","text":"Precool Benchtop Centrifuge and make sure temperature is at 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"50hh4","text":"Prepare tools, mortar and pestle, and work surface by spraying down with RNAse Away.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"cusbv","text":"Weigh out 100mg of preserved tissue. If you have to cut a smaller piece of tissue to get 100mg, do so in a petri dish placed on a piece of dry ice so sample remains frozen.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7aac4","text":"Add two ladles of liquid nitrogen to a clean mortar and pestle; allow to become cold.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9265h","text":"After about half of liquid nitrogen has evaporated, add snapfrozen or AllProtect tissue to the mortar.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"1lqpi","text":"Add another ladle of liquid nitrogen to mortar and allow about half of the liquid nitrogen to boil off. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c4acc","text":"Begin smashing and grinding up tissue with the pestle; this is an ongoing process so keep adding liquid nitrogen until grinding creates a fine powder. Do not let the mortar and sample get warm.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"csnhu","text":"Note - samples have a tendency to pop out of the mortar, having a silicone lid top on the mortar in the beginning helps keep tissue contained.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4pd3u","text":"Once you have the desired consistency of a fine powder, add half a ladle of liquid nitrogen and tilt mortar slightly on its side and begin scraping liquid nitrogen/powdered tissue suspension to the bottom for a more thorough collection.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ej1as","text":"Just as the liquid nitrogen evaporates, use a pre-chilled scoop to transfer tissue powder right away into a chilled CK28R tube with Trizol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"c758","text":"Place cooled CK28R tubes with samples in the Precellys and use 6500rpm, 20 second cycles for a total of 4 times. Cool tubes on ice for 3 minutes between each cycle.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3ateu","text":"Once samples are finished on the Precellys with 4 cycles run, transfer Trizol to a new 1.5mL tube.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9cmp","text":"You may continue OR stop here and immediately place sample into a -80℃ freezer for next day RNA extraction.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e8t2d","text":"Preparation before starting the isolation protocol:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dk2fi","text":"i. Pre-cool Benchtop Centrifuge to 4℃ AND make sure you have another benchtop centrifuge at Room Temperature.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"k6ck","text":"ii. Prepare Digestion Buffer (DNaseⅠ 5ul x   +1, DNA Digestion Buffer 35ul x   +1) according to Zymo's protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":42,"length":5},{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":76,"length":6}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8lt3d","text":"Spin at 12,000g for 15 minutes in 4℃ benchtop centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8avst","text":"Transfer top aqueous layer (about 400uL) to a Room Temperature 1.5mL microtube.  Be careful to not disturb the middle and bottom layers.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"adaij","text":"Add 1:1 of 100% Ethanol to the tube with aqueous phase.  (For example-  400uL top layer and 400uL 100% Ethanol).  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4lfvd","text":"Mix Ethanol and aqueous phase gently by pipetting and then add 400uL to Zymo column. When loading column, be careful to not get the rim wet. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"3r28g","text":"Centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 1 minute at 4℃. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b0a85","text":"Discard flow through after spin, invert collection tube and dab tube on paper towel to remove excess liquid.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"11puu","text":"Add 400uL of Direct-zol RNA Wash Buffer to the column and centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 1 minute at 4℃. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"e2rai","text":"Add 40uL Digestion Buffer (see step 14 ii.) to the column matrix. Incubate at Room Temperature for 15 minutes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"a3abp","text":"Add 400uL of Direct-zol RNA PreWash Buffer to the column and centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 1 minute at 4℃. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"g9pr","text":"Add 700uL of Direct-zol RNA Wash Buffer to the column and centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 1 minute at 4℃.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"37bo8","text":"Discard flow-through and the collection tube. Put the column in a new collection tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"aetde","text":"Centrifuge for 2 minutes at 14,000 rpm at 4℃.  ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"ah1nm","text":"Transfer the column carefully into a 1.5mL tube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7kl5p","text":"Add 15uL of DNase/RNase-Free Water to the membrane to elute RNA. Centrifuge at 14,000 rpm for 1 minute at 4℃.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9kbg1","text":"Check RNA concentration using Nanodrop. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"72ksg","text":"Add 1 mL Trizol/TRI Reagent to CK28R bead tubes and place tubes on ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: Tissue Homogenization
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"9osen","text":"If sample was stored in AllProtect, briefly rinse in PBS and wipe off excess liquid with Kimwipes prior to weighing out tissue. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"4p8ds","text":"Add 200uL chloroform (20% volume) to the Trizol and vortex for 30 seconds. If Trizol samples were previously frozen at -80℃, gradually thaw samples on wet ice. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f1d8m","text":"Add 80uL (20% volume) of chloroform, vortex for 30 seconds. Incubate tubes for 10 minutes at Room Temperature. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"8pssu","text":"Spin at 12,000g for 15 minutes in 4℃ benchtop centrifuge.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"49agu","text":"Transfer 400uL of the aqueous phase into 1.5mL microtube. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"6l4ea","text":"Discard flow-through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"akpbs","text":"Discard flow-through. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"7k8ir","text":"Repeat Steps 28 and 29.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

steps.section: RNA Extraction Using Zymo Direct-zol MicroPrep Kit
steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"be13d","text":"Repeat Steps 22-23 so that all of the mixture has gone through the column.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: RNA Isolation of Human Meniscus
